entry.dcterms:description: 1. party preferences, popularity of politicians, subjective financial situation, economic expectations 2. social distance from groups of people (Bogardus scale), stereotypes about the Roma, opinions about the Roma asylum seeking abroad, opinions about the government measures to improve the situation of the Roma, authoritarian personality traits (F scale) 3. economic participation, participation in the second economy, enterpreneurial activity, discontinuing and restarting enterprise from the seventies up till today, employment status 4. relationship with banks, savings habits, using bank card and bank transfer, expectations towards banking services, maximalizing interest
